heading: Tonight
text: Beginning as mostly cloudy, then clearing from the west to the east overnight. Patchy valley fog. Lows mainly in the 50s, a few upper 40s in the cold spots. Wind becoming light and variable.

heading: Sunday
text: Partly cloudy in the morning, then increasing sunshine from the west as the day goes on. Highs in the 70s, some 80s possible in the warmest valleys. Light wind.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly clear. Areas of river valley fog. Lows From the mid to upper 40s in the north east, increasing to the low 50s in the south and west.
